Bodhisattva-mahÄsattvas know that the minds of all sentient beings have no location, yet they say that the minds of sentient beings have locations. 'The worlds in the ten directions are immeasurable and boundless, without limit. The bodhisattva gives rise to this great vow: I shall adorn these worlds with unsurpassed pure adornment, and those adornments will all be real and not false.'
